original: Ernberg, Johan Magnus Gordon, nederländsk vicekonsul, Karlskrona, f 19/2/86 i Karlskrona av konsul Axel E. o. Edla Andersson. G. 16 m. Elsa Abramsson. Barn: Ulla f. 17, Eva 18, Marianne 20. — Studiex. 04, kansliex. 10, DHS II. Aman. o. tf. sekr. i komm:koll. 12-18, num. aff :man. Nederländsk vicekonsul i Karlskrona sed. 26. Led. av stadsfullm. 25-36, ordf. i styr. f. Karlskrona Ångslups A-B, led. av SFMK (KFMF), fänrik där. NedONO, SFMKGM, KFMFGM.
translated: Ernberg, Johan Magnus Gordon, Dutch Vice Consul in Karlskrona, born February 19th, 1886 in Karlskrona to Consul Axel E. and Edla Andersson. Married to Elsa Abramsson in 1916. Children: Ulla (born 1917), Eva (born 1918), Marianne (born 1920). He completed his secondary education in 1904 and his civil service examination in 1910, followed by further studies at the DHS II. He served as an assistant and acting secretary in the municipal council from 1912 to 1918 and as a numerical affairs manager. Appointed as Dutch Vice Consul in Karlskrona since 1926. He was a member of the city council from 1925 to 1936, chairman of the board of Karlskrona Ångslups A-B, a member of the SFMK (KFMF) and a lieutenant there. He received the Order of Orange-Nassau, SFMKGM, KFMFGM.

structured.name: Johan Magnus Gordon Ernberg
jobTitle: Chairman of Board of Karlskrona Ångslups A-B
